item.title: ruby mechanize
item.description: #mechanize download url #https://github.com/tenderlove/mechanize #Nokogiri #http://nokogiri.org/tutorials/installing_nokogiri.html #http://mechanize.rubyforge.org/ #Installation… #sudo port install libxml2 libxslt #sudo gem install nokogiri #No definition for parse_file #irb #» require ‘nokogiri’ quit #gem install mechanize #gem install net-http-digest_auth
